name: Pong 1 or 2 Players
description:
This is a game made by using this tutorial guide:

Use W and S keys to move blue player up and down. When in 2 player mode, use the up and down arrow keys to move the orange player

The game features:

  • Single player and multiplayer
  • A functioning exit button that will close the game
  • Absolute silence (no music or sound effects)
  • A Fun Pong Experience

I hope you have fun playing this version of pong!
